title: The Golden seal
creator_credit: The Samuel Goldwyn Company, Samuel Goldwyn and Frank Zuniga
brief_description: On a stormy night on the island of UNAK, a young boy named Eric (Torquil Campbell) comes face to face with the legendary golden seal. A powerful bond of friendship grows between them as Eric struggles to save the life of the young seal from the hunters who want to kill it for it’s highly prized pelt. A charming, touching and beautifully photographed family film.
